title: Supreme Court to Weigh Hot-Button Issues Against Tense Political Backdrop
text:
WASHINGTON—The Supreme Court returns from its summer recess on Monday to a set of polarizing cases that could demonstrate the impact of President Trump’s appointees—and the influence of Chief Justice John Roberts—against the backdrop of an impeachment inquiry and a looming election.

Pick a hot-button issue and it’s on the docket—or could be soon. Gay rights? Oral arguments are set for Tuesday. Mr. Trump’s cancellation of the immigration program known as DACA? It’s slated for November. Gun rights? That’s on tap for December,...
